website_summaries.verdict: If you miss sleeping in when you camp, you'll love the Dark Rest feature here, which does a great job blocking sunlight.
pros: Dark Rest feature keeps the morning sun out
Very simple to pitch and take down
cons: Some buyers report quality issues with small holes in the fabric and flimsy stakes

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best easy up tent I have used. I used it on a few camping trips for myself only. Love the room inside and made great. One night it rained hard and had heavy winds..... kept me dry and was very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent, really blocks the sun.
customer_reviews.text: Proved really dark and with rain fly dry even in a down pour. From inside I couldn't see any light outside with the windows up. People outside didn't know I had a light on inside. We had a downpoor one night and had no issues, unlike another tent at the site. Easy for one person to set up and take down in just a couple minutes, including adjusting position, attaching rain fly, tying down guy wires, and adding pouches. The center hook proved useful for fan/light. Only "issue" is light blocking fabric also retains heat and blocks airflow. Like most tents I have no idea how they come up with the number of people it will hold
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S Smith

customer_reviews.title: Decent tent
customer_reviews.text: We used it last weekend and the Tent did great, with a queen size air deep air mattress the tent fills up pretty quick but it still fit what we needed. We had a good amount of rain day two and did not have a drop of water in the tent. The dark rest is the only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars the spray or how ever it’s applied is even so there are a lot of dark and light spots, as well as these little rounds spot where there is no shading. It still stayed dark enough that we slept comfortably in the some what shade till about 8am.
customer_reviews.author: Sparktrician480

customer_reviews.title: Super dark inside/impossible to put in the bag and zip it up
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent. It's really dark inside and super quick and easy for one person to put up and take down. The only thing I don't like is that the bag is to small and the tent does not fit in it at all. I had to put it in a larger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Maass

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough for my 9yr old to set up with me.
customer_reviews.author: Raine

customer_reviews.title: Poles are NOT attached
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet....the hubby will be doing so next week. The first thing is the poles ARE NOT pre attached as stated. But the rest of the tent seems to be as advertised. The interior is nicely darkened.
customer_reviews.author: Mom-2

customer_reviews.title: Just YES! If you are looking for a tent ...
customer_reviews.text: Just YES! If you are looking for a tent which can go up in under 2 minutes and come down in the same time - Yes! Get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J. D. Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Great tent. Very roomy and nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. Very roomy and nicely made. It really does help with keeping the hot sun and light out in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Sims

customer_reviews.title: This tent is NOT instant
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it twice. This one is not instant. It is the dark tent but the Ozark instant 6 person is a completely different color.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: This is a lie!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing instant about this tent. The poles are not pre-attached. They are just regular poles that come in a separate bag and have to be assembled every time.
customer_reviews.author: Eracer

customer_reviews.title: not for those with weak upper body strength
customer_reviews.text: I loved the looks of this tent. I bought it because the description and video gave me the impression the poles were already attached to the tent. As an older woman with shoulder issues I did not have enough strength to put the connecting pipe on between the roof poles and the side wall poles due to the tension required on the poles to stretch out tent. Need a strong tenting partner to help with this- still looking for him!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Griffith

customer_reviews.title: NOT Instant Tent
customer_reviews.text: NOT an instant tent. Regular version of 6 person dark rest tent. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As good as advertised. I had no problem sleeping in. It was dark inside!
customer_reviews.author: KEN

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size as described! I set it up in less than 2 minutes on my own.
customer_reviews.author: TDONOVAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice 👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave this 4 stars was because it didn’t come with the cover for it in case it rains- you have to purchase it separately. Don’t get why? Most other tents come with it. I bought the 6 person tent and it was very spacious. I like that it has windows on all sides and the color is very pretty. Super easy to set up- literally less than a minute 🤪
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent! The darkness keeps my young children from waking with the sun. Very easy to put up or take down.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory A Scott

customer_reviews.title: No rain fly even?
customer_reviews.text: Tent seems to be nice enough, but unboxed it for camping the first time and it didn't include stakes, rain fly or any accessories. I feel extremely upset and had to go to Walmart to buy another tent due to inclement weather.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha N. Bjornson

customer_reviews.title: Pitching a tent in 60 seconds!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and literally goes up in less than 60 seconds. Haven’t tried it in rain yet but It seems very well built compared to the half dozen or so tents I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: I love this tent
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent. Just used it for the first time. It keeps it very dark and it didn't get any hotter then a regular tent. It is so easy to put up and take down. Only reason I gave it 3 stars is because I noticed some little holes in the seams and a couple in the flooring. I wouldn't have noticed except I was folding my air mattress up and was on the floor and saw light coming through. Otherwise I absolutely love this tent.
customer_reviews.author: stacy

customer_reviews.title: Keep out the heat!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for blocking out the early rays and providing cool comfort in hot climates. Some small scuffs appeared after first use but down low so it’s workable
customer_reviews.author: bradley j davis

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Tent
customer_reviews.text: The first one that arrived was the wrong tent. Sent it back only to receive the wrong one again. gave up trying to get the right one due to time
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to seat up and take Put we had problem with the zipper from the first use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is super easy to set up- the dark inside walls and skylight provide a very relaxing, comfortable sleep. Love this tent!
customer_reviews.author: Prometz

customer_reviews.title: NO RAIN FLY
customer_reviews.text: Love the tent, was very displeased that it did not come with a rain fly! Had I known it wasn't included I wouldn't have bought this product. Now I have to find a rain fly to cover the stargazing panels for trips that it rains. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tent. So easy and quick to set up. It rained for several days and stayed dry. For the money this a great camping tent.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Callihan

product_meta.title: Ozark Trail 6-Person Dark Rest Instant Cabin Tent

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
